name: There are more things
description:
“There are more things in heaven and earth, Horatio, than are dreamt of in your philosophy”

-W. Shakespeare (Hamlet).

A short and story-based game developed for the Scream Jam with hand-painted watercolor art. Inspired by Jorge Luis Borges short story of the same name, “There are more things” welcomes you to the house that used to be your aunt’s. She is dead now and the new inhabitant is nowhere to be seen, but you hear rumors it is now the house of an evil witch.

But you don’t really believe that, do you? Somehow this whole story is keeping you awake at night, so you finally decide to go inside the house. Maybe they’ve left the door open…

Controls: 

PC: Use the arrow keys to move and jump.
Android: Touch controls.

Created by:

Programming: https://www.rustyroboz.com/   ( https://drobert.itch.io/)
Art/Texts: https://www.instagram.com/onlythedays/  ( https://onlythedays.itch.io/)
